meanings.definition: To subject (wood or other material) to fire or intense heat in order to dry or carbonize it.
meanings.sent1: The workers were torrefying the wood to make it suitable for building.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter torrefied the timber before starting the construction.
meanings.sent3: The campfire was torrefying the marshmallows to perfection.
meanings.sent4: The scorching sun torrefied the desert sand, making it unbearable to walk on.
meanings.sent5: The blacksmith's forge torrefied the metal, turning it into a molten liquid.
